identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a recipe extraction app that feels like a high-end digital cookbook, not a database.
principles: Fusion: Cookbook Aesthetics x SaaS Functionality
Content: The Recipe is the Hero
Negative Space: Breathing room for ingredients
Contrast: Crisp text against organic textures

accent.description: Use for primary CTAs (Save, Extract) to stimulate appetite

heading.usage: Recipe titles, Section headers, Hero text

scale.h1: text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl tracking-tight leading-tight font-serif
scale.caption: text-sm text-stone-500 uppercase tracking-widest

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary/20 text-primary hover:bg-secondary/30 h-12 px-6 rounded-full font-medium transition-all

cards.recipe: group relative bg-white border border-stone-100 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1
cards.ingredient: flex items-center p-4 bg-stone-50 rounded-xl border border-transparent hover:border-stone-200 transition-colors

inputs.url_bar: h-14 pl-6 pr-4 rounded-full border-2 border-stone-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary/10 text-lg shadow-sm transition-all

textures.grain: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and fonts defined in this JSON.
3. USE SHADCN: Customize existing Shadcn components (Button, Input, Card) to match the 'rounded-full' and 'organic' aesthetic.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento' grid for the recipe directory. Don't just list them.
5. EXTRACTION VIEW: Create a 'Focus Mode' where the recipe content is center stage, distraction-free.
6. EMAIL MODAL: Make it feel like sending a postcard or a gift, not a form submission.
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'SaaS Blue' at all costs.
Use 2-3x more whitespace than you think is necessary.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use #1C1917 or similar.
Interactive elements must have clear hover states.
Images must be high quality and appetizing.
